price: Hunda isaanitiif fakkeenyota taasifnee jirra. Hunda isaanii barbadeessuu barbadeessinee jirra.
arabic: وَكُلّٗا ضَرَبۡنَا لَهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَۖ وَكُلّٗا تَبَّرۡنَا تَتۡبِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wakullan ḍarabnā lahu al-amthāla wakullan tabbarnā tatbīran
